titles.title: Animal Crush Video Prohibition Act of 2010
Providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 5566 and the Senate amendment thereto.

action.text: Mr. Conyers moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1712.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/15/2010--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 5566 (Animal Crush Video Prohibition Act of 2010).
